  • Constructor Details

    • LocalOptimization

      public LocalOptimization(GlobalSearch sol, int max_no_improve, double alpha, ArrayList<Area> all_areas, Region[] regions, double threshold, int num_thread) throws CloneNotSupportedException
      The LocalOptimization class that further optimizes the heterogeneity by moving areas between regions
      Parameters:
      sol - the partition identified from the global search
      max_no_improve - the maximum number of non-improving move
      alpha - the paramter for simulated annealing
      all_areas - the list of all input areas
      regions - the array of regions from the partition
      threshold - the threshold value from the user-defined constraint
      num_thread - the number of thread in the local optimization
      Throws:
      CloneNotSupportedException - cloning areas

  • Method Details

    • get_best_labels

      public ArrayList<Integer> get_best_labels()
      get the labels of area to region in the partition that has the best heterogeneity
      Returns:
      the labels of the regionalization results found through the searching that has the minimum heterogeneity
